intro:
Hi, This is Victor Mendes

Highly passionate about Web & Mobile Development. Over the past few years, I’ve been building projects combining front-end and back-end technologies. I have experience with tools like Nuxt, Vue, TailwindCSS, and I'm currently deepening my skills in Vue.js and Nuxt.

I'm currently pursuing a degree in Systems Analysis and Development at UNISUAM and working as a Front-End Development Intern, where I continue to grow by solving real-world problems with clean, efficient code.

I am always open to learning new technologies and building meaningful digital experiences.
responsibilities:
• Develop and maintain responsive user interfaces using Vue.js, Nuxt and TailwindCSS
  • Collaborate with the team to implement new features and improvements
  • Write clean, maintainable code while following best practices
  • Continuously learn and apply new technologies in real-world projects

education.degree1: Technologist in Systems Analysis and Development

form.subjectPlaceholder: Enter the subject of the message (optional)

projectA.description: It's a responsive music player web application built with pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The player allows users to listen to MP3 tracks directly in the browser, with a custom-designed interface. I developed this project focusing on a clean layout, intuitive controls, and smooth user experience. The goal was to create a lightweight and accessible platform to play songs or beats on both desktop and mobile devices.

projectB.description: It's a responsive e-commerce website for an açaí shop, built with HTML, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript. The platform allows users to browse products such as açaí cups in different sizes, with a modern and mobile-friendly layout. I developed this project focusing on simple and efficient navigation, an attractive design, and essential features for an online store.

projectC.description: It's an institutional website developed as my first internship project at CBPF. I used Vue.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Nuxt.js to build a modern, responsive, and easy-to-navigate page, presenting institutional information clearly and effectively.

projectD.description: I developed the website to promote a 32-hour training program designed to transform scientific knowledge into innovation with real impact on society. The platform presents the course structure, objectives, and stages, while also highlighting opportunities for participants to connect with funding calls and partnerships such as InScience+.

I am available for project based or part: I am available for project based or part time offers!
